title: R for Health Data Analysis: An Introduction
description: In this article, you will learn about R programming and it's application in the field of statistics, data analytics, data science, genomic data science and bioinformatics research.

title: R for Health Data Analysis: Variables and Reserved Words
description: In this article, you will learn about what are variables?, how to create them? the naming convention of varibales in R programming. I'll also mention some reserved keywords which can not be a variable name.
